languages.text: "Оголение {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}Истинной плоти{/g} при мирянах непозволительно. Одеяние не помешает протоколу очистки свершиться".
"It is prohibited to expose the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}True Flesh{/g} in the presence of laypeople. My raiment will not hinder the cleaning protocol."
languages.original_text: "Оголение {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}Истинной плоти{/g} при мирянах непозволительно. Одеяние не помешает протоколу очистки свершиться".

languages.text: « Il est interdit d'exposer la {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}chair véritable{/g} aux yeux des profanes. Mon habit n'entravera pas le protocole de nettoyage. »

languages.text: «Está prohibido exponer la {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}verdadera carne{/g} frente a los laicos. Mi atuendo no entorpecerá el protocolo de limpieza».
languages.original_text: "It is prohibited to expose the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}True Flesh{/g} in the presence of laypeople. My raiment will not hinder the cleaning protocol."

traits.locale_text: «Está prohibido exponer la verdadera carne frente a los laicos. Mi atuendo no entorpecerá el protocolo de limpieza».

languages.text: “将{g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}实肉{/g}暴露在教外人士面前是严格禁止事项，我的衣服不会妨碍执行清洁协议。”
languages.original_text: "It is prohibited to expose the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}True Flesh{/g} in the presence of laypeople. My raiment will not hinder the cleaning protocol."

traits.locale_text: “将实肉暴露在教外人士面前是严格禁止事项，我的衣服不会妨碍执行清洁协议。”

languages.text: 「平信徒の前で{g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}真の肉体{/g} をさらけ出すことは禁じられている。私の身なりは、洗浄プロトコルの妨げにはならない」
languages.original_text: "It is prohibited to expose the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}True Flesh{/g} in the presence of laypeople. My raiment will not hinder the cleaning protocol."

traits.locale_text: 「平信徒の前で真の肉体をさらけ出すことは禁じられている。私の身なりは、洗浄プロトコルの妨げにはならない」

languages.text: "Es ist verboten, das {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}Wahre Fleisch{/g} in Anwesenheit von Laien zu entblößen. Mein Gewand steht dem Reinigungsprotokoll nicht im Wege."
languages.original_text: "It is prohibited to expose the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}True Flesh{/g} in the presence of laypeople. My raiment will not hinder the cleaning protocol."

languages.text: "Avamın mevcut olduğu durumlarda {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}Salt Suret{/g}'i açığa çıkarmak yasaklıdır. Giysim, temizlik protokolüne engel olmayacaktır."
